vote.title: An ordinance abandoning a portion of a sanitary sewer easement to Kleberg Traders Market, Inc. and Kleberg Market Place, Inc., the abutting owners, containing approximately 7,432 square feet of land, located near the intersection of C. F. Hawn Freeway and Woody Road - Revenue: General Fund $5,400.00, plus the $20.00 ordinance publication fee
